problem.p: A satellite revolves around the Earth in a circular orbit. Which force forms a "Newton's 3rd law pair" with the weight of the satellite?

choicegroup.choice: the gravitational force exerted on the satellite by the Earth
the centripetal force acting on the satellite
the gravitational force exerted on the Earth by the satellite
the weight of the satellite has no "Newton's 3rd law pair" because the satellite is in free fall
